mapper.sql: id, activityId, memberId, activityPackageId, serialNumber, status, amount, channel, name, phone, IDCard, signUpTime, cancelSignUpTime, remark, refundTime, createTime, updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into t_activity_sign_up(activityId, memberId, activityPackageId, serialNumber, amount, channel, name, phone, IDCard, remark, createTime, updateTime) values(#{activityId}, #{memberId}, #{activityPackageId}, #{serialNumber}, #{amount}, #{channel}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{IDCard}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select asu.*, a.title AS activityTitle, ap.title AS activityPackageTitle, ap.price AS activityPackagePrice from t_activity_sign_up asu inner join t_activity a on a.id = asu.activityId inner join t_activity_package ap on ap.id = asu.activityPackageId
limit ${index}, ${row}
